relation: Of Pigs and Masks- The Battle of Epic Proportions
Of Pigs - #39 This is how MOTHER 3 really went down.

As Ness waits for his lazy neighbor to eat, he’s suddenly conscious that they have no information or leads on Picky’s whereabouts. Of course, in a twist of irony, a phone call solves all of their problems.

Anyways. Chalk pastels are really fun. They’re messy, but great to work with if you want a burst of color. This was a lot of fun to do, because I had freedom with crazy proportions, colors, sizes, etc. The mushrooms, are you sure they’re edible? They seem…. ….alright…
Bah, this is old, I never submitted it. Just Picky and a Mr. Saturn~
